title: Tryndanoob's ult should be rebalanced.
body: I mean where the actual hell does it make sense that he can use his ult through stuns and Silences? I mean sure he relies heavily on his ult, but so does Akali, and Ahri, so it makes no sense that his ult goes through silences and stuns while others ult's CAN'T, I mean just AT LEAST make it unusable while stunned or silenced.

replies.body: Tryndamere need a full VGU, maybe we will see it in 10 years.

> [{quoted}](name=The Deckowner,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7krOvZG8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-03-08T05:43:57.893+0000)
>
> Tryndamere need a full VGU, maybe we will see it in 10 years.

no visual update until after he's balanced.

Usually they leave Champions in a functional but weak/bland state while waiting to update them. 

Tryndamere is in an odd state in that he *completely* destroys new players and disjointed teams. And I mean completely, I remember those days, they were not fun. However, once you get past that point he just kinda... disappears. When you run into him in game he's less likely to want to crit your face in and more likely to constantly pull your teammates top lane to deal with his split push. 

He needs a kit that makes him less overbearing to new/low rank players and more engaging for higher skilled ones.

EXACTLY! at least make him take skill instead of just button-mashing his ass off.

I just hate that he gets it like every 60 seconds with some cool down. He goes shot for shot with another champ then pops it and you can't get away and he gets 5 seconds to just beat on you with it and if you are not close to dying he just slows you for 4 long seconds more and runs away.

> [{quoted}](name=A FLUFFY BUNNY 1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7krOvZG8,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-03-08T10:25:41.604+0000)

Yeah the cooldown is dumb as hell, he should take more skill than just pressing R every minute.
I agree on balance work but in the other direcrion. He is really weak right now and needs buffs, maybe a 10 second duration on his ult or full cc immunity.

No no no, his ult is fine in length, it should be disabled from activation during stun and silence.

Sorry, that was sarcasm with no point. He needs to be completely reworked to fix his problems. They originally gave him the ability to ult when cc'ed way back when because he was completely worthless against any team that had even one cc skill.

If that were taken from him he would be completely worthless and never played again, probably even in low elo games.
